name: Kobold Ambusher
text: You are adept at moving fast and staying hidden.
benefit: You take no penalty on Stealth checks when you move up to your full speed. You can use the run or charge action and remain hidden, taking a –10 penalty on the check to do so.
normal: When moving greater than half speed up to your full speed, you take a –5 penalty on Stealth checks. When you are able to run or charge while using Stealth, you take a –20 penalty on the Stealth check.
staminaText: When you use the run or charge action and wish to remain hidden, you can spend 2 stamina points to decrease the penalty for doing so to –5.
text_zh: 你善于快速移动以及保持隐蔽。
benefit_zh: 你可以在隐匿时进行全速移动而不会使隐匿检定受到任何罚值。你可以在冲锋或者奔跑时保持隐藏，但是这么做会使隐匿检定-10。
normal_zh: 如果你在隐匿时移动速度高于半速则会使隐匿检定上-5。当你在奔跑或冲锋时使用隐匿，你会使隐匿检定-20【译注：核心书隐匿技能说明冲锋或者奔跑时无法隐匿。不知是否有勘误，求解。】
staminaText_zh: 当你使用奔跑或者冲锋动作并希望保持躲藏时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这样做的减值降低到-5。
